Can Indian Economy expect revival despite rising inflation? What do you think are the major steps that can be taken in present circumstances to push growth in the country?

Yes,Indian Economy can expect revival despite rising inflation

Raising inflation is very difficult for the lower class and middle class people.As the inflation prevails rapidly there will be no chance for the individual to grow economically.If the individual is not growing then we can't expect our country to be in a good position.So,Inflation should be avoided through proper care taken by the government by considering all different people living in a society.All the people in the country should be educated.As Abdul Kalam says that 'His life may not be presumptious model for the people but it gives some solace to the underpriviledged people how his life has been shaped and also to come out of an illusory thought of backwardness'.In present circumstances to push the country in growth everyone should be educated with the quality of education and should be aware with all the current affairs. So,that it helps to be updated in the way which helps for our country to be successfull.

The major steps that can be taken in present circumstances to push growth in the country are as follows:

1. The main reason which helps to push growth in the country is that everyone should be aware   about what and why the inflation is taking place.

2. Inflation is prevailed in our country due to the lack of study and focus on how the things are going on in and around the world.

3. Illiteracy is also one of the main cause which is making our country to be still as underdeveloping.So,it will be avoided by literating the people in the country. 

4.People should know how the researches are going on ,they should take care about the projects that are to be made for understanding for the generations in future.

5.Government should take care and consider all categories of people that they should not face any problems due to inflation.

6.'Quality of work' should be given more importance so that their will be chance of increasing in the economy.

7. Good politics are also one of the major thing which helps our country to grow widely.

8. Technical knowledge should also be used and that should convey to all the users for the betterment of the society.

9. Inflation may raise some problems where the people can't afford.So,the government should be in a position to help those who are affecting with it.

10.All the individuals should feel that they are responsible for the inflation.So,that they can work towards to not to have the inflation in our country.

11.Women should be given chance to work for the development of the country because" A bird can't fly with only one wing." 

12.Strict laws should be passed by the government to not have the inflation as it is affecting the mankind which demotivates all the individuals and which results in the lack of confidence to help or push the countries growth.

The above are the major steps which are to be taken to push growth in the country.

Conclusion : To push growth in the country on has to be supported by the government and also every individual should feel responsible to make a growth in order to have a better quality of life.This will be achieved when the people are having high quality of thinking to grow their country and which inturn helps to grow as individuals.One should have the management skills that "To manage when they have nothing and also should know how to behave when they have everything."
